meta.name: description
meta.content: Gabbart Communications provides easy-to-use school websites, mobile apps, and mass communications tools to enhance parental involvement and improve public relations with your community! We make website management easy. Ask us about our Harmony CMS and WISDOM LMS!

div.span: Update: Good Morning everyone, many of you have inquired about the status of GABCON and whether it is being rescheduled or canceled. GABCON 2020 remains scheduled to take place as planned, June . . .

COVID-19 Statement –
Published 3/13/20
Greetings, we recognize that Schools and communities are stepping into the unknown, in reacting to the fast-evolving coronavirus pandemic. We've been . . .

span.span: ”Before we found Gabbart, we were switching web hosting companies every couple of years. We just couldn’t find something that was adequate enough, the customer service was never great and our teachers were tired of having to always learn something new. Now they know we all love Gabbart, it’s easy to use! Our district agrees we are here to stay!!

div.span:
Gabbart Communications
218 N 3rd Ave, Durant Oklahoma 74701
